TextBody:
Hello,

The Epp agent is not able to block the user from deleting a file.
It can use file tracing to monitor this action.
File Tracing – this feature allows you to monitor data traffic between protected
endpoints and removable devices, internal eSATA HDDs, and Network Shares. It also
shows other actions that took place, such as files named, deleted, accessed,
modified, etc

Kind regards
__________________
Andrei Pop | Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Endpoint Protector

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.

TextBody:
Hello,

To enable this feature, you can do so from Device Control, Global Settings, or granularly for
Groups or Computers.

Kind regards
__________________
Andrei Pop | Technical Support Engineer
Netwrix Endpoint Protector
